scripts.preinstall: node -e "!process.env.npm_config_user_agent.startsWith('pnpm/') && !console.log('Install pnpm globally using \`npm i -g pnpm\` then do \`pnpm i\` to install dependencies in this repository\n') && process.exit(1)"
scripts.preuninstall: node -e "!process.env.npm_config_user_agent.startsWith('pnpm/') && !console.log('Install pnpm globally using \`npm i -g pnpm\` then do \`pnpm i\` to install dependencies in this repository\n') && process.exit(1)"
